title: Past Recipe
description: Try This Pasta Recipe | Quick & Easy Dinner Recipe
text: Penne Paste - 2 Tablespoon Oil  (Olive oil preferably) - Oignons - Salt to Taste - Water -  Tomato Sauce   - 1 Teaspoon dry oregano  OR  2 Tablespoon fresh oregano - 2 Tablespoon fresh Thyme (OPTIONAL) - 1/4 Teaspoon Cayenne pepper (OPTIONAL)

title: Chicken Recipe
text: Penne Paste - 2 Tablespoon Oil  (Olive oil preferably) - Oignons - Salt to Taste - Water -  Tomato Sauce   - 1 Teaspoon dry oregano  OR  2 Tablespoon fresh oregano - 2 Tablespoon fresh Thyme (OPTIONAL) - 1/4 Teaspoon Cayenne pepper (OPTIONAL)
